Regulation Name(s): Calculator/data processing module for clinical use
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Genesis Health Technologies Blood Glucose Meter, Model TD-4123
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Genesis Health Record System software accessory to blood glucose meter for wireless data management and diabetes care support
Indications for Use Summary: Accessory to Genesis Health Technologies Blood Glucose Meter, Model TD-4123 to assist adult diabetic patients and healthcare professionals in reviewing blood glucose test results and related information for diabetes management; not for diagnosis or automated treatment guidance.
